original_title: Biffy Clyro: Cultural Sons of Scotland
overview: Amazon Music, Warner Records and Biffy Clyro present ‘Biffy Clyro: Cultural Sons of Scotland’, an intimate documentary film showing the back-to-basics recording process they adopted to create their ninth studio album, ‘The Myth of the Happily Ever After’.
title: Biffy Clyro: Cultural Sons of Scotland
